text:
Hi Enrico !! Sorry for my late reply too !! I just realised i don't receive notification from this app and since i've been busy with uni it slipped my mind to check !!

Is the production finished now ?? And tests ?? I didn't know you had to take test in studios ! What kind of test are they ?? 
What studios did you apply to if you don't mind me asking !? But fingers crossed you get the studio you want to go to !!


What kind of things do you make in zbrush ? More of like characters or props ???

I have heard Blender is pretty good ! Ill make sure to download it !

I've been alright though!! Although i've been a little sick and fell slightly behind with some work i've managed to catch up ! I'm currently in the middle of the 3nd week of my game art module, and it's absolutely amazing !! We've been doing some modelling, uv unwrapping, material, textures and maps in photoshop and unreal as well as lighting and its all really interesting ! I really love it
